comment:
* Utility class for writing BackupHelpers with added logging capabilities.
 * Used for passing a logger object to Helper in key shared backup agents
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public abstract void performBackup(ParcelFileDescriptor oldState, BackupDataOutput data, ParcelFileDescriptor newState)
public BackupRestoreEventLogger getLogger()
methods.comment: * Gets the logger so that the backuphelper can log success/error for each datatype handled

methods.name: public void setLogger(BackupRestoreEventLogger logger)
methods.comment: * Allow the shared backup agent to pass a logger to each of its backup helper

methods.name: public boolean isLoggerSet()
methods.comment: * Allow the helper to check if its shared backup agent has passed a logger

methodNames: public abstract void performBackup(ParcelFileDescriptor oldState, BackupDataOutput data, ParcelFileDescriptor newState)
